timeline.message:
Introduce pegasus-all meta-project

Adds a new module, "pegasus-all", which is simply a meta-project that
programmatically depends on all other consumer-facing modules. This
makes it easier for certain use cases to pull in the entire dependency
tree.

timeline.bodyText: Should we add any documentations to other places as well?
timeline.author: junchuanwang

replies.bodyText: I'm not sure. We could add documentation to the website, but there isn't currently documentation on which artifacts do what. We could potentially add documentation to the description of each module's POM artifact, but that's a change for another day.
replies.author: evanw555

timeline.bodyText: Based on the wording here, it's usage is somewhat non-standard? I will recommend adding to somewhere to let consumer's know.
timeline.author: junchuanwang

replies.bodyText: I'm not too sure how we can surface this to people. I think I'll merge this for now and ponder that afterward.
